com.adobe.granite.rest.converter.siren

Class AbstractPageableSirenConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.adobe.granite.rest.converter.siren.AbstractSirenConverter
      • com.adobe.granite.rest.converter.siren.AbstractPageableSirenConverter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ResourceConverter<Entity>

    public abstract class AbstractPageableSirenConverter
extends AbstractSirenConverter
    AbstractCollectionConverter is a base implementation of AbstractSirenConverter for pageable resources. It provides functionality additional functionality for paging. ResourceConverter implementations are encouraged to extend from this abstract base class.
